$$C(n) ~=~ An^3+Un+F$$

$$C'(n) = 3An^2+U$$

$$c(n) = An^2+U+\frac{F}{n}$$
$$c'(n) = 2An-\frac{F}{n^2}$$
$$\frac{F}{n^2} = 2An$$
$$\sqrt[3]{\frac{F}{2A}}= n$$

$$R(n) ~=~ Bn-Cn^3$$

$$P(n) ~=~ (-A-C)n^3+(B-U)n-F$$

$$P'(n) ~=~ (-3A-3C)n^2+(B-U)$$

$$(-3A-3C)n^2+(B-U) = 0$$

$$n = \sqrt{\frac{B-U}{3A+3C}}$$
